Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Hello Operator

I am deeply shocked and appalled by the content posted on your website. It is inconceivable that such cruel and disturbing images and videos are even allowed to exist. Depicting violence, abuse and other heinous acts is not only morally reprehensible, but also illegal.

I urge you to remove this content immediately and stop the distribution of such horrific materials. It is important that we work together as a society to prevent such cruelty and hold those responsible to account.

I hope that you recognize the gravity of the situation and act accordingly. It is our shared responsibility to create a safer and more respectful world.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.67

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.towneers.www

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

issue.title: www.calm.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.calm.com/ko/app](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.calm.com%2Fko%2Fapp) ### Comment > Adguard를 활성화하고 calm.com의 명상 서비스를 이용한다. 그러면 사진이 제대로 로드되지 않고 기능이 제대로 동작하지 않으며, 컨텐츠를 재생할 수 없다. Username: `@liurefaiwueb` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6g36zoh6kow0kog884k4gckk0sw04g862dbis3l1nw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pbppha0s2eoo48sc440gcosc8og48ks36xgvmm9hx4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hgzbqcis5w08c8w0s8gwowgg8808wwkl2gl2rmyflw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.1.1731 release System version: | macOS 15.0.1(24A348) Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/mac_v2/filters/15.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
List-KR Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/ko/settings/import.html?browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&channel=release&clid=yu5BhZ&custom_filters=&dns.bootstraps=&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_enabled=false&dns.fallbacks=&dns.filters=https%3A%2F%2Ffilters.adtidy.org%2Fmac_v2%2Ffilters%2F15.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=2000&filters=2.227&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.15.1.1731+release&referrer=&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=false&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.calm.com%2Fko%2Fapp&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Macintosh%3B+Intel+Mac+OS+X+10_15_7%29+AppleWebKit%2F605.1.15+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Version%2F18.0.1+Safari%2F605.1.15&userscripts=AdGuard+Extra+%28url%3A+https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=mac)
